remarks: Tuple extension of monoid homomorphisms.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Sep-2015.)
statement:
mhmvlin.b $e |- B = ( Base ` M ) $.
mhmvlin.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` M ) $.
mhmvlin.q $e |- .+^ = ( +g ` N ) $.
mhmvlin $p |- ( ( F e. ( M MndHom N ) /\ X e. ( B ^m I ) /\ Y e. ( B ^m I ) ) -> ( F o. ( X oF .+ Y ) ) = ( ( F o. X ) oF .+^ ( F o. Y ) ) ) $.
